verses.name: Numbers 19:1
verses.text: And the Lord spake unto Moses and unto Aaron, saying,

verses.name: Numbers 19:2
verses.text: This is the ordinance of the law which the Lord hath commanded, saying, Speak unto the children of Israel, that they bring thee a red heifer without spot, wherein is no blemish, and upon which never came yoke:

verses.name: Numbers 19:3
verses.text: And ye shall give her unto Eleazar the priest, that he may bring her forth without the camp, and one shall slay her before his face:

verses.name: Numbers 19:4
verses.text: And Eleazar the priest shall take of her blood with his finger, and sprinkle of her blood directly before the tabernacle of the congregation seven times:
